Class Battleship

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Battleship
  • public abstract class Battleship
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Battleships are one of the main elements of this game. A battleship is an actor that is on the BattleWorld grid during the game. Each ship is associated with a player and has a certain amount of hits it can endure before going down. There are 3 subclasses of battleship, Zoomboat, Submarine, and Cruiser. Battleships can be selected one at a time by each player during their turn.
    Version:
    June 14, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei
